revised_title: Investigation of the Enamel Development in Vertebrate Teeth
tldr: The author examines the development of enamel in vertebrate teeth, focusing on the cuticula dentis and the origin of enamel. The study investigates the various membranes, including the newly-formed layer of enamel, the membrane praformativa, and the first-formed layer of dentine, and provides insights into the nature and origin of enamel.
